item.title: About
item.description: Hallo, ich bin ein Informatik Student und Data Scientist aus Kiel.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Keine falsche Scheu. Wenn dir etwas auf der Zunge brennt, dann melde dich! Dazu einfach das folgende Kontaktformula ausfüllen. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message

item.title: Jim Kwik: Limitless - Book summary
item.description: Jim Kwik: Limitless Notes How can i use this? Why must i use this? When will i use this? Quotes Often when you put a label on someone or something, you create a limit - the label becomes the limitation. What’s one of your dreams? One that is ever present, like a splinter in your brain? Imagine it in vivid detail. Visualize it. Feel it. Beliveve it. And work daily for it.

item.title: Storytelling with data - Book summary
item.description: Storytelling with data Notes Introduction Visualization is the key to communicate data. This book is about to get the best out of your visualizations for your specific context. Remove clutter, which kinds of graphs you can use, design, storytelling, dissecting your data etc. The importance of context Knowing the context of your presentation leads to a much better presentation Explanatory -and Exploratory analysis Exploratory - find the most important findings (e.
